amendment.description: Amendment sought to exclude scientific information published solely in internal Interior Department publications from the definition of "best available science.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-563 to exclude scientific information published solely in internal Interior Department publications from the definition of "best available science".

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 227 (Roll no. 460).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 227 (Roll no. 460).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
